questions.question: Where is coordinate (0,0) in Canvas?
questions.explanation: Canvas uses top-left origin with X increasing right and Y increasing down.

questions.question: What can Canvas draw?
questions.explanation: Canvas 2D can draw shapes, text, and images. For 3D, use WebGL.

questions.question: How to draw a circle?
questions.explanation: arc() draws circular arcs. Full circle: 0 to 2π radians.

questions.question: Why is Canvas better than DOM for games?
questions.correctAnswer: Canvas offers better performance for frequent redraws by using immediate mode rendering instead of maintaining a DOM tree
questions.explanation: Canvas is optimized for pixel-level rendering, crucial for smooth game animation.

troubleshooting.solution: Set canvas width/height attributes, not CSS. For high-DPI: multiply dimensions by devicePixelRatio.
Check: 1) Canvas size set? 2) fillStyle/strokeStyle set before drawing? 3) Coordinates within canvas bounds?
